title: Trade Deadline Takeaways, and Rams vs. Saints and Rodgers vs. Brady Previews | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 335)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to give their takeaways on the surprisingly active NFL trade deadline (1:30) before workshopping some Cleveland Browns takes on “Take Shop” and previewing Rams vs. Saints, along with the other blockbuster matchups heading into Week 9 (25:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
